alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:59PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Utah and east central Tooele Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 258 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cedar Fort, or 22 miles southeast of Tooele, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eagle Mountain, Cedar Fort, Ophir, Tooele Army Depot South and Fairfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
